name: The strange mysteries of Godwins Manor
name_original: The strange mysteries of Godwins Manor
description:
Godwins Manor is a single player horror stealth game experience in the Lovecraft universe.

After a chain of kidnappings in 20th century London, follow a lead as a detective into the ancient and mysterious mansion of Richard Godwin. Navigate the narrow and dark hallways with your flashlight, gather evidence of your case and find out what is really going on before the residents of the house catch you. Use the property's tables to hide or blind the residents with an overload of your flashlight. But be careful, the light from your flashlight could reveal your position.

Cinematographer/Developer: https://salah84.itch.io

Designer/Animator/Developer:  https://nantodev.itch.io/

Story-Writer/Developer: https://voidchaser.itch.io/

Backend Developer: https://luis283.itch.io/

Audio-Design/Developer: https://infinite-dev.itch.io/

Background Music: Guardian Angel  (2020)  Olive Musique
